childFields.name: otpType
childFields.description: Enum to specifiy whether to send OTP via SMS or email

childFields.name: contact
childFields.description: Email or phone number to send the OTP code to

childFields.name: logoUrl
childFields.description: A URL pointing to a logo in PNG format. Note this logo will be resized to fit into 340px x 124px.

childFields.name: magicLinkTemplate
childFields.description: A template for the URL to be used in a magic link button, e.g. `https://dapp.xyz/%s`. The auth bundle will be interpolated into the `%s`.

childFields.name: templateVariables
childFields.description: JSON object containing key/value pairs to be used with custom templates.

childFields.name: templateId
childFields.description: Unique identifier for a given Email Template. If not specified, the default is the most recent Email Template.

childFields.name: template
childFields.description: Template containing references to .OtpCode i.e Your OTP is {{.OtpCode}}

childFields.name: userIdentifier
childFields.description: Optional client-generated user identifier to enable per-user rate limiting for SMS auth. We recommend using a hash of the client-side IP address.

childFields.name: sendFromEmailAddress
childFields.description: Optional custom email address from which to send the OTP email

childFields.name: otpId
childFields.description: Unique identifier for an OTP authentication
